Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
I have the following Old Judges for trade.

GAI Authentic(All are nice) ---Jevne(Minn), Rehse(Minn), Crogan(MAROONS), Terry(Brook)sold

GAI Twos ----- Curtis(St. Joes), Wells(Mil)sold

Scans are available. I can provide my want list to you if your interested in some of these cards. I am looking to trade for other 19th century cards - Old Judges, Mayos or Tobin H891s. I also will entertain selling.  Thanks Bruce Kasarda
